items.sentence: I\'m glad you warned me before it was too late.
I\'m going to have breakfast with Tom tomorrow.
I\'m going to stay for another couple of weeks.
Tom discovered two dead bodies in his basement.
Tom does a pretty good job concealing his pain.
I hope Tom doesn\'t think we\'ve forgotten him.
The road between here and Tom\'s is pretty bad.
I think it\'s time for me to sharpen my pencil.
I thought you weren\'t supposed to talk to Tom.
Tom and his friends asked me to come with them.
Tom and his friends painted the barn yesterday.
I\'m sure I\'ve seen that guy somewhere before.
I\'m sure Tom won\'t have to work late tonight.
I\'m sure we should\'ve turned left back there.
I\'ve always dreamed of owning my own business.
I\'ve been bitten by mosquitos all over my arm.
I\'ve been flying commercial jets for 13 years.
Tom isn\'t supposed to get paid for doing that.
Tom thought Mary\'s behavior was inappropriate.
Why are you planning on going home early today?
Don\'t do anything that you might regret later.
Do you mind if I ask you a couple of questions?
I\'ve been teaching Tom how to play the guitar.
If Tom had seen anything, he would\'ve told us.
Will you look after our pets while we\'re away?
I assure you I\'ve considered that possibility.
We need to make sure Tom doesn\'t hurt himself.
Tom did say that he didn\'t want to go with us.
Tom didn\'t believe that Mary would lie to him.
Tom didn\'t care whether Mary liked him or not.
Tom could lose everything if he\'s not careful.
Tom couldn\'t believe Mary just hung up on him.
Tom couldn\'t persuade Mary to accept his gift.
Tom crossed the bridge to get to Mary\'s house.
Make sure that you don\'t get on the wrong bus.
Tom didn\'t say we weren\'t allowed to do this.
Why do you want to make your boyfriend jealous?
Tom is talking to the French teacher right now.
Don\'t do the crime, if you can\'t do the time.
Tom told Mary that he\'d stay at John\'s place.
Tom always tries to do what he thinks is right.
Tom and Mary are on good terms with each other.
Tom and Mary are planning a picnic at the lake.
Tom and Mary both complained about the weather.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was sick.
Tom was back in Boston during the summer break.
Tom said that Mary was good at speaking French.
Tom convinced Mary to go to the party with him.
Tom could stay with us tonight if he wanted to.
I don\'t usually peel apples before I eat them.
